description:
As I mentioned last week, Alan didn't seem to concerned about getting head from a dude.
Ransom was eager to work with someone not so nervous, and Alan just never seems to wilt, nor sit and stare at the TV the entire time.
Like his solo, we had storms, so you get some thunder and rain sound effects in the background.
Alan enjoyed getting rimmed and stayed hard even for that. Sometimes the guys go to zero on that, but he seemed to like it.
If you watched him jerk-off last week, then you know he has a rapid-fire technique that I knew Ransom was going to have to duplicate.
Ransom jerks him hard and fast until a giant glob of semen flies into the air! Alan got a lot more distance on this nut for sure!
title: Alan & Ransom - Serviced
